title: (x) Text face used on this forum - Georgia {Ties}
content:
Okay, I’m sure this has already been asked and/or I’m such an idiot for not knowing, but what is the font used in this forum? As in, the font that this post is. Thank you!

XOXOX Christine

 [‹ (x) "Graham" bold block face w/ open R - ITC Eras {self}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123021729/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36140 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Premium Quality" classic script - Bickham Script {Adriano S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123021729/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36146 "Go to next forum topic")
author: caslonista

comments.content:
[Georgia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123021729/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgia_%28typeface%29), designed by Matthew Carter; a system font that is installed on most computers.

T.
